"Built in the hull of the decommissioned Kunai-class torpedo bomber, the Verdure is a botanist's dream. There's very little you can't do with plants on the Verdure, as it features a full service layout, chemistry facilities, advanced resource extraction, and spacious freezer. It even comes with a small shop setup."
